name: add-form
title: Impact On-chain Form
description: Share your positive impact to the world, with blockchain security..

name: add-question
title: Institution's carbon mitigation: Does the institution have a proprietary carbon mitigation program?
description: If yes, inform how many tons of carbon have already been mitigated by the company. If there is no program, answer 0.

name: add-question
title: Benefit Sharing: Is benefit sharing among stakeholders planned and structured?
description: If the Institution has identified all the parties interested in the Institutions' actions and has publicly made available a document that details the distribution of benefits, answer ''Yes''. If the interested parties and their benefits have not been identified and structured in public documentation, answer No.
